== Thekkumkara (CT) (627935) ==

Thekkumkara (CT) is a town in the [[Mukundapuram]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 9.01 sq. km. and harbouring 3766 households with total population of 15258 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Thrissur]] is at a distance of 31 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 280 km. Male population is 7110 and female population is 8148. Scheduled Caste population is 1629 and Scheduled Tribes population is 28. Census Location Code of the town is 627935<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Thrissur (m corp.) at a distance of 31 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 70 km. Railway station is at Irinjalakuda at a distance of 8 km.
